name: Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Collection
description:
PC Engine Best Collection: Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Collection (PC Engine Best Colｌections 銀河お嬢様伝説コレクション) is a Compilation/Miscellaneous video game published by Hudson Soft released on July 31st, 2008 for the PlayStation Portable.

This compilation include 3 PC Engine (TurboGrafx-16) games of the Galaxy Fraulein Yuna series:
Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna (1992)
Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna 2: Eien no Princess (1995)
Ginga Fukei Densetsu Sapphire (1995)
